tool_description: Searches for available accommodations within a geographic area, returning basic property information from multiple booking platforms.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (10-500)

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid radius: Radius must be between 1 and 50 kilometers.
Invalid property types: Use supported types like hotel, apartment, hostel, resort, bed_and_breakfast.
Invalid max_results: Must be between 10 and 500.
No accommodations found: Try expanding the search radius or different location.
usage: Provide latitude and longitude coordinates, optionally set radius_km, property_types, and max_results. Returns a list of accommodation properties in the area.

property_types.description: Types of each property (hotel, apartment, etc.)

base_prices.description: Starting prices per night in local currency
